about_the_game:
Welcome, student of mysteries!

This game is here to help with learning correspondences from Liber 777, book filled with data about various systems of thought, religions, mysticism and magick.

For anyone who tried that, it is clear that learning Liber 777 correspondences by heart is not an easy task to accomplish. To avoid laborious drill, game is using interactive method of learning with immediate feedback.

This 2D, UI based game contains over 50 skills, which you can master. Each skill represents column from Liber 777 - dictionary of esoteric symbols. Skills are designed in tree-like structure, which need to be conquered level by level. After certain skill groups, player needs to pass test to continue.

Mastered skills can be further practiced in Practice Mode, where you can train yourself by playing with random questions or selected key.

There is also Free Play mode, where you can access skills in any order.
Game contains option to swap correspondences of Tzaddi and He related paths on the Tree of Life as suggested by Aleister Crowley, when trying to solve certain mysteries from the Book of the Law.
